events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but I want to return it because it doesn’t fit well. Please advise how I can get a refund.
The customer has requested a return and refund for their recent purchase due to sizing issues.
The refund request case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. for handling the return procedure.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I’m happy to assist you with your return and refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket has been worn or damaged?
My order number is 789654321. The jacket is brand new, still with tags. I just tried it on once and it doesn’t fit well.
Thanks for the info. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we emailed you, and once we receive the item, we will process your refund promptly.
Great, thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back soon.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear on your original payment method.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your return request.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks for the smooth and easy process!
We’re glad everything was resolved. Closing your case now. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
